actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain federal lands adjacent to Lake Shore Drive, Lake Lowell, Boise Project, Idaho.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the adjacent landowners for fair market value specified land adjacent to Lake Shore Drive, Lake Lowell, Boise Project, Idaho. Reserves to the United States all mineral deposits in such lands.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain federal lands adjacent to Lake Shore Drive, Lake Lowell, Boise Project, Idaho.
